scripts.launch:happ: npm run start:precheck; dotenv -- concurrently npm:start:happ npm:build:nh-watch
scripts.browser:dev: npm run start:precheck; dotenv -- concurrently npm:start:holochain-single npm:start:nh npm:start:browser-single
scripts.browser:dev2: npm run start:precheck; dotenv -- concurrently npm:start:holochain-double npm:start:nh2 npm:start:browser-double
scripts.start:precheck: npm run build:nh; npm run start:check-local-services; npm run clean:sandbox
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS ./workdir/we.happ --ui-path ./ui/app/dist network  --bootstrap `cat .bootstrap-path` webrtc `cat .signal-path`
scripts.start:holochain-single: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/we.happ --run $VITE_HC_PORT -a we network  --bootstrap `cat .bootstrap-path` webrtc `cat .signal-path`
scripts.start:holochain-double: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT,$VITE_ADMIN_PORT_2 generate ./workdir/we.happ -n $AGENTS --run=$VITE_HC_PORT,$VITE_HC_PORT_2 -a we network --bootstrap `cat .bootstrap-path` webrtc `cat .signal-path`
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run build:es-libs && npm run package -w nh-launcher && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/we/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/lobby/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/sensemaker/workdir && hc dna pack ./dnas/test_provider/workdir
scripts.build:es-libs: npm run build:nh-client && npm run build:membrane-invitations && npm run build:nh-launcher-applet
scripts.build:nh: npm run build:happ && npm run build:es-libs && npm run build -w nh-launcher
scripts.clean: npm run clean:sandbox; npm run clean:build && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:build: rimraf target; npm run clean:dnas; npm run clean:happ; rimraf ui/app/dist; exit 0
